name: Demolition Banger Race
description:
Take part on 12 different tracks and race in 10 different cars as you aim to become champion. You will encounter madness along the way as 31 cars on track in a small area is always going to be the recipe for disaster. In Demolition Banger Race you will Race, Jump, Crash, Drift, and take short cuts as you bend the opposition with your nimble Micro or destroy the opposition with your heavy limo.

(UK Oval Pack £1.99)
